Verses: 1 pannirandaam Varusham Pannirandaam Maadham Mudhalaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Nee Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonaikkuriththup Pulambi, Avanode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Jaadhigalukkulle Nee Paalasingaththukku Oppaanavan; Nee Perunthanneergalil Mudhalaiyaippol Irundhu Un Nadhigalil Ezhumbi, Un Kaalgalaal Thanneergalaik Kalakki Avaigalin Aarugalaik Kuzhappivittaai.
3 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar: Naan Vegu Janakkoottaththaikkondu Unmel En Valaiyai Veesuven; Avargal En Valaiyil Unnai Izhuththukkolvaargal.
4 unnaith Tharaiyile Pottuviduven; Naan Unnai Vettaveliyil Erindhuvittu, Aagaayaththup Paravaigalaiyellaam Unmel Irangappanni, Boomiyanaiththin Mirugangalaiyum Unnaal Thirupthiyaakki,
5 un Sadhaiyaip Parvadhangalinmel Pottu, Un Udalinaale Pallaththaakkugalai Nirappi,
6 nee Neendhina Dhesaththinmel Un Raththaththaip Parvadhangalmattum Paayachcheyven; Aarugal Unnaale Nirambum.
7 unnai Naan Anaiththuppodugaiyil, Vaanaththai Moodi, Adhin Natchaththirangalai Irundupogappannuven; Sooriyanai Megaththinaal Mooduven, Sandhiranum Than Oliyaikkodaadhirukkum.
8 naan Vaanajodhiyaana Vilakkugalaiyellaam Unmel Irundupogappanni, Un Dhesaththinmel Andhagaaraththai Varappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
9 un Sangaaraththai Jaadhigalmattum, Nee Ariyaadha Dhesangalmattum Naan Ettappannugaiyil, Anegam Janangalin Irudhayaththai Visanamadaiyappannuven.

10 anegam Janangalai Unnimiththam Thigaikkappannuven; Avargalin Raajaakkal, Thangal Mugangalukku Munbaaga En Pattayaththai Naan Veesugaiyil Migavum Thidukkiduvaargal; Nee Vizhum Naalil Avaravar Thamtham Praananukkaaga Nimishandhorum Thaththalippaargal.
11 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Baabilon Raajaavin Pattayam Unmel Varum.

12 paraakkiramasaaligalin Pattayangalaal Un Janaththiralai Vizhappannuven; Avargalellaarum Jaadhigalil Vallamaiyaanavargal; Avargal Egipthin Aadambaraththaik Keduppaargal; Adhin Eraalamaana Koottam Azhikkappadum.

13 thiralaana Thanneergalin Karaigalil Nadamaadugira Adhin Mirugajeevangalaiyellaam Azhippen; Ini Manushanudaiya Kaal Avaigalaik Kalakkuvadhumillai, Mirugangaludaiya Kulambugal Avaigalaik Kuzhappuvadhumillai.
14 appozhudhu Avargaludaiya Thanneergalaith Theliyappanni, Avargal Aarugalai Enneyaippol Odappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

15 naan Egipthudhesaththai Paazhaakkumpodhum, Dhesam Than Niraivai Izhandhu Verumaiyaaik Kidakkumpodhum, Naan Adhil Kudiyirukkira Yaavaraiyum Sangarikkumpodhum, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.

16 idhu Pulambal; Ippadip Pulambuvaargal; Ippadi Jaadhigalin Kumaaraththigal Pulambuvaargal; Ippadi Egipthukkaagavum, Adhinudaiya Ellaath Thiralaana Janangalukkaagavum Pulambuvaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
17 pinnum Pannirandaam Varusham Andha Maadhaththin Padhinaindhaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

18 manupuththirane, Nee Egipthinudaiya Eraalamaana Janaththinimiththam Pulambi, Avargalaiyum Prabalamaana Jaadhigalin Kumaaraththigalaiyum Kuzhiyil Iranginavargal Andaiyile Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Thallividu.
19 matravargalaippaarkkilum Nee Azhagil Sirandhavalo? Nee Irangi, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalidaththil Kida.
20 avargal Pattayaththaal Vettundavargalin Naduvile Vizhuvaargal, Pattayaththukku Oppukkodukkappattirukkiraargal; Avalaiyum Avaludaiya Janaththiral Yaavaiyum Pidiththizhungal.

21 paraakkiramasaaligalil Vallavargalum Avanukkuth Thunainindravargalum, Paadhaalaththin Naduvilirundhu Avanode Pesuvaargal; Avargal Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalaai Pattayaththaal Vettundu Irangi, Ange Kidakkiraargal.
22 ange Asoorum Avanudaiya Ellaakkoottaththaarum Kidakkiraargal; Avanai Sutrilum Avargaludaiya Predhakkuzhigal Irukkiradhu; Avargal Ellaarum Pattayaththaal Vettundu Vizhundhaargaldhaane.

23 paadhaalaththin Pakkangalil Avargaludaiya Predhakkuzhigal Irukkiradhu; Avanudaiya Predhakkuzhiyai Sutrilum Avanudaiya Koottam Kidakkiradhu, Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththile Kediyundaakkina Avargalellaarum Pattayaththaal Vettundu Vizhundhavargaldhaane.

24 ange Elaamum Avanudaiya Predhakkuzhiyai Sutrilum Avanudaiya Ellaa Eraalamaana Janamum Kidakkiraargal; Avargalellaarum Pattayaththaal Vettundu Vizhundhu, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalaai Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Iranginaargal; Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththile Kediyundaakkina Avargal, Kuzhiyil Iranginavargalodekoodath Thangal Avamaanaththai Sumakkiraargal.

25 vettundavargalin Naduve Avanai Avanudaiya Ellaa Eraalamaana Janaththukkullum Kidaththinaargal; Avanai Sutrilum Avargaludaiya Predhakkuzhigal Irukkiradhu; Avargalellaarum Pattayaththaal Vettunda Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargal; Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththile Avargal Kediyundaakkinavargalaayirundhum, Avargal Kuzhiyil Iranginavargalodekoodath Thangal Avamaanaththai Sumakkiraargal; Avan Vettundavargalin Naduve Vaikkappattirukkiraan.

26 ange Mesekkum Thoobaalum Avargaludaiya Eraalamaana Janangalum Kidakkiraargal; Avargalaichchutrilum Avargaludaiya Predhakkuzhigal Irukkiradhu; Avanudaiya Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththile Kediyundaakkinavargalaayirundhum, Avargalellaarum Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargal; Pattayaththaal Vettundu Vizhuvaargal.

27 jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththile Paraakkiramasaaligalukkuk Kediyundaakkugiravargalaayirundhum, Avargal Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalaai Vizhundhu, Thangal Yuththa Aayudhangalodu Paadhaalaththilirangina Paraakkiramasaaligalode Ivargal Kidappadhillai; Avargal Thangal Pattayangalaith Thangal Thalaigalinkeezh Vaiththaargal; Aanaalum Avargaludaiya Akkiramam Thangal Elumbugalinmel Irukkum.
28 neeyum Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalin Naduve Norungundu Pattayaththaal Vettundavargalode Kidappaai.

29 ange Edhomum Adhin Raajaakkalum Adhin Ellaap Prabukkalum Kidakkiraargal; Pattayaththaal Vettundavargalidaththil Ivargal Thangal Vallamaiyodunkoodak Kidaththappattaargal; Ivargal Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalidaththilum, Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalidaththilum Kidakkiraargal.

30 ange Vadathisai Adhipadhigal Anaivarum Ellaa Seedhoniyarum Kidakkiraargal; Ivargal Kediyundaakkugiravargalaayirundhaalum Thangal Paraakkiramaththaik Kuriththu Vetkappattu, Vettundavargalidaththilirangi, Pattayaththaal Vettundavargalode Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalaaik Kidandhu, Kuzhiyil Iranginavargalidaththil Thangal Avamaanaththai Sumandhukondirukkiraargal.

31 paarvon Avargalaip Paarththu Than Eraalamaana Janaththinperilum Aarudhaladaivaan; Pattayaththaal Vettundaargalendru, Paarvonum Avanudaiya Sarva Senaiyum Aarudhaladaivaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

32 ennaip Patriya Kediyai Jeevanullor Dhesaththil Undupannugiren, Paarvonum Avanudaiya Eraalamaana Janamum Pattayaththaal Vettundavargalidaththil Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalin Naduve Kidaththappaduvaargal Engiradhaik Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
